DOC.brief_summary: The purpose SLE study evaluate efficacy , safety tolerability two different dos LY2127399 administer addition standard care therapy patient active SLE .
DOC.brief_title: A Study LY2127399 Patients With Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis SLE American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) criterion Have positive antinuclear antibody ( ANA ) Agree become pregnant throughout course trial Have appropriate Safety Estrogens Lupus Erythematosus National Assessment Systemic Lupus Erythematosus Disease Activity Index ( SELENASLEDAI ) score screen Have active severe Lupus kidney disease Have active Central Nervous System peripheral neurologic disease Have receive intravenous immunoglobulin ( IVIg ) within 180 day randomization Have active recent infection within 30 day screen Have serious infection within 90 day randomization Have evidence test positive Hepatitis B Have Hepatitis C Are human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) positive Have evidence active latent tuberculosis ( TB ) Presence significant laboratory abnormality screen Have malignancy past 5 year , except cervical carcinoma insitu basal cell squamous epithelial skin cell completely resect reoccurrence 3 yr prior randomization Have receive great 40 mg prednisone equivalent past 30 day Have change dose antimalarial drug past 30 day Have change dose immunosuppressive drug past 90 day Have previously receive rituximab
